p: YOU CAN SPEND ALL YOUR MONEY BEFORE YOU START YOUR TRIP - OR YOU CAN SAVE SOME OF YOUR CASH TO SPEND AT FORTS ALONG THE WAY WHEN YOU RUN LOW. HOWEVER, ITEMS COST MORE AT THE FORTS.

YOU CAN ALSO GO HUNTING ALONG THE WAY TO GET MORE FOOD. WHENEVER YOU HAVE TO USE YOUR TRUSTY RIFLE ALONG THE WAY, YOU WILL SEE THE WORDS: 'TYPE BANG'. THE FASTER YOU TYPE IN THE WORD 'BANG' AND HIT 'RETURN' KEY, THE BETTER LUCK YOU'LL HAVE WITH YOUR GUN.
WHEN ASKED TO ENTER MONEY AMOUNTS, DON'T USE A '$'.
GOOD LUCK!!!
